name: Pelican Seafood Restaurant
address: 1895 E Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V5L 1T3, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Shui Mai Dumplings / 飛魚子燒賣
hasMenuItem.description: Tender pork dumplings topped with fish roe, wrapped in thin yellow skins.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Dumpling / 少油蝦餃皇
hasMenuItem.description: Delicate dumplings filled with succulent shrimp, wrapped in a translucent, tender dough.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Spring Rolls / 蒜香蝦春卷
hasMenuItem.description: Golden, crispy rolls filled with tender shrimp and aromatic garlic, paired with a light, flaky wrapper.

hasMenuItem.name: Yang Chow Fried Rice / 揚州炒飯
hasMenuItem.description: Savory fried rice with diced ham, scrambled eggs, green peas, and scallions, garnished with crispy bits for added texture.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Green Beans with Minced Pork / 干扁四季豆
hasMenuItem.description: Tender green beans sautéed with minced pork and seasoned with a spicy blend of traditional Chinese spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Traditional Sticky Rice Wraps / 健怡糯米雞
hasMenuItem.description: Sticky rice filled with savory meats and mushrooms, wrapped in lotus leaves.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Prawns & Chives Dumpling / 香煎韭菜餅
hasMenuItem.description: Savory dumplings filled with prawns and chives, pan-fried to a golden crisp.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fried Beef & Rice Noodle / 干炒牛河
hasMenuItem.description: Tender beef slices and rice noodles stir-fried with bean sprouts, green onions, and soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Homemade Daikon Cake / 阿嫲蘿卜糕
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried daikon radish cake with bits of savory cured meat, topped with bean sprouts and a hint of chili.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamed BBQ Pork Buns / 蜜汁叉焼飽
hasMenuItem.description: Soft and fluffy buns filled with savory and sweet barbecued pork.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Congee / ⽣滾滑雞粥
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken pieces in a smooth, creamy rice porridge.

hasMenuItem.name: Stuffed Bean Curd Wraps in Oyster Sauce / 蠔皇鮮竹卷
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed bean curd wraps filled with a savory blend, typically including pork and vegetables, generously coated in a rich oyster sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Salt and Pepper Deep Fried Tofu / 椒鹽豆腐
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried tofu seasoned with salt and pepper, accompanied by capsicum, onion, spring onion, and garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Chow Mein with Mixed Vegetable / 杂菜炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried chow mein noodles with a medley of vegetables, typically including cabbage, carrots, mushrooms, and bean sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: House Special Chow Mein Assorted Seafood with Crispy Noodle / 招牌炒面
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy noodles topped with assorted seafood, including shrimp, squid, and fish, accompanied by fresh broccoli.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet & Sour Pork / 菠蘿咕噜肉

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Rice with Prawns / 虾炒飯
hasMenuItem.description: Fried rice with tender prawns, typically includes egg, peas, carrots, and onions, following traditional Chinese culinary techniques.

hasMenuItem.description: Flat rice noodles stir-fried with slices of beef and a medley of vegetables, typically including bean sprouts and onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Green Beans with Minced Pork / 干扁四季豆
hasMenuItem.description: Tender green beans sautéed with minced pork and seasoned with a spicy blend of traditional Chinese spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Chow Mein with Pickled Vegetable / 味菜牛肉炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried chow mein noodles with tender beef slices and pickled vegetables, offering a unique blend of flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Clam in Blackbean Sauce / 豉汁炒蜆
hasMenuItem.description: Clams stir-fried with onions and green peppers, generously coated in a savory black bean sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Sticky Rice with Chinese Sausage / 生炒野米腊味糯米飯
hasMenuItem.description: Sticky rice fried with Chinese sausage and typically includes a savory blend of traditional seasonings and vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Supreme Soy Sauce Chow Mein / 豉油皇炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried egg noodles with soy sauce, onions, and green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Bean Curd Sheets with Mushrooms / 雙菇腐皮球
hasMenuItem.description: Sautéed bean curd sheets and a mix of shiitake and another variety of mushrooms, typically prepared with a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Jellyfish & Beef Cold Plate / 海哲牛展
hasMenuItem.description: Jellyfish and beef, thinly sliced and served chilled, typically includes a delicate dressing to enhance the flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Wonton / 红油抽手
hasMenuItem.description: Tender wontons filled with seasoned meat, drizzled with a spicy chili oil sauce, and garnished with fresh green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Wonton Soup (Small) / 雲吞湯(小)
hasMenuItem.description: Wonton Soup typically includes delicate wontons filled with a mixture of minced pork and shrimp, served in a savory chicken broth with choy sum.

hasMenuItem.name: Mushroom with Beef Tenderlion / 干燒鲜菌牛柳粒
hasMenuItem.description: Sliced beef tenderloin stir-fried with a variety of fresh mushrooms, typically served in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Gai Lan with Oyster Sauce / 蠔油芥蘭
hasMenuItem.description: Savor our Gai Lan with Oyster Sauce, where blanched Chinese broccoli is elegantly dressed in a rich, umami-packed oyster sauce, showcasing a balance of textures and flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Buddha's Feast Vegetable / 生炒罗汉齋
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried mixed vegetables including bok choy, broccoli, mushrooms, baby corn, snow peas, bamboo shoots, and water chestnuts, typically in a light sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Wild Rice with Dried Scallops & Egg White / 瑶柱蛋白炒健康米
hasMenuItem.description: Dried scallops and egg white tossed with wild rice, typically includes hints of garlic and scallions for a subtle flavor enhancement.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Rice with Seafood & Scallops / 有米佬炒瑤柱带子海鲜飯
hasMenuItem.description: Pan-fried rice with scallops, shrimp, and additional seafood, typically includes mixed vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Shanghai Style Chow Mein / 上海粗炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Thick Shanghai-style noodles stir-fried with a savory mix of shrimp, chicken, bbq pork, and assorted vegetables, embodying the essence of traditional Shanghai cuisine.

hasMenuItem.name: Stir Fried Flat Rice Noodle with Beef / 干炒牛河

hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried chicken and soft egg noodles, typically includes pickled vegetables for a tangy contrast.

hasMenuItem.name: Fried Rice with Mixed Vegetable / 杂菜炒饭
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried rice mixed with a variety of vegetables, offering a colorful and satisfying meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot & Sour Seafood Soup (Small) / 海鲜酸辣湯 （小)

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Tripe & Daikon Hot Pot / 柱候蘿卜牛筋肚煲
hasMenuItem.description: Served in a traditional hot pot, this dish combines tender beef tripe and daikon, simmered with a blend of spices and herbs for a hearty meal.

hasMenuItem.name: Country Style Fried Vermicelli / 家鄉炒米
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried vermicelli with a mix of traditional ingredients, capturing the essence of homestyle cooking in a simple yet satisfying dish.

hasMenuItem.description: Sliced chicken and assorted vegetables stir-fried with flat rice noodles in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Sautéed Diced Chicken & Vegetables in Spicy Sauce / 酱爆雞丁

review.reviewBody: I've never had Pelican Seafood Restaurant Special Chow Mein / 招牌炒面  delivered so well! The sauce was separate from the crispy noodles so it arrived still fully crispy! 12/10
Delicious food and the dim sum pieces are big! A favourite and I'm so happy to see them on DoorDash. We'll definitely be ordering again soon.
EVERYTHING ORDERED WAS BLAND , HAD TO SPICE IT UP TO EAT IT . SPRINGROLLS UNDER COOKED
I got the wrong order! I was waiting for my Chinese Donut Wrapped with Rice Flour Roll / 布拉肉鬆炸两腸粉 !
